title: Wón Veé Ghàm Vilù
description: Yì-iì dzə̀ é laʼ yímóʼó,  a wóné dzə̀ fó ataár,  a vé-eè kér ghvə́m. Kíghàʼ-aà dzə̀ ji vé-eè fèr wón vin a dzə̀ e ghám vilùu,  aá kù nèn taʼtìn a dzə vitsə́ʼə́,  bìʼfo vé-eè fan fóo rèŋ e shùy. Yii bèy,  woo mòʼón woo wán woo lumèn nèn lò a ker shií fó yen ji shùy sà lóo ban,  fó ndzəə wàa dzə e le á? Wù nèn lò soòné,  e fəə̀. Mo wù fəən,  shùy kúm,  wù nèn yaàné. Kindzə́m kí shèr tím a fə́r və́,  yii bèy,  á ku yòʼ sòv vighev ji á sà-áà ghán é le,  e bóo sə fə́r wov á?

title: Musesugona

title: Abaana Abaava Mu Nvumbo
description: Edda ennyo waaliwo amaka omwali abaana abawulize ennyo basatu. Ekibi nti abaana abo baali baava mu nvumbo. Bwe kityo baalinga okukola buli kintu ekiro olw'okwewala okusaanuukira mu musana. Naye omu ku balensi ayagala okugendako ebweru alabe ku kitangaala ky'omusana era bw'atyo atambula n'agenda ebweru. Era nga bwe kisuubirwa, yasaanuukira mu musana. Baganda be baanakuwala nnyo naye baakolawo entegeka okuyamba muganda waabwe.

title: Ukuqakatheka Kwababelethi Nefundo.

Unina lika Snara wambizela amapholisa bona amthusele ukuze alise iindakamizwa abuyele esikolweni ukuze iksasa lakhe libe lihle begodu  asize nabanye abentwana abalandelako.

title: Ukwakheka Kombani
description: Indaba kaJabulani noJamludi isichazela kabanzi ngokwakheka kombani. Imayelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu. Kulendaba kwenzeka isimanga kwakheka umbani futhi kwana imvula ngenkathi kwebiwa izinkomo zakubo kaJabulani. UJabulani waba yiqhawe elikhaliphile ngokuba nesibindi lapho abanye abafana bethukile. UJabulani wabeka impilo yakhe encupheni ukuze kubuye imfuyo yakubo. Ukushintsha kwesimo sezulu kwafundisa uJabulani nabangani bakhe ngokubaluleka kokuzimisela noma isimo sinzima.

title: Leeu Se Vuur Stokke.
description: Die verhaal gaan oor hoe mense gekom het om in besit te wees van vuur en hoe Leeu gekom om almal se vyand te wees . In die begin het al die diere en die mense  saam gelewe en die Leeu het beheer van die vuur gehad. Hy het sy stokke gebruik om vuur te maak , en almal om hom moes rou kos eet. Die mense het 'n plan uit gedink deur saam te  sing en dans en  al die diere saam te bring, insluitend die Leeu met sy vuur stokke . Die mense gaan voort om Haas, Springbok en Duiker te vra om die stokke te gryp en weg te hardloop terwyl Leeu besig gehou word  , maar hulle het almal misluk en die Leeu behou sy stokke en sing 'n dreigende liedjie vir hulle . Laastens slaag die Volstruis daarin  en gryp die stokke en hardloop weg van Leeu af. Op Leeu se terugkeer maak hy die belofte dat hy vir ewig die mense en diere sal jag. Die mens het  die mag oor  vuur , maar die Leeu as 'n vyand .
author: Sasha-Lee Scheepers

Te mvá  àlʉ rɨ̀ nɨ́ lèlé àngʉ̀ nyakʉ́drìá rɨ̀ nɨ edâ  ètúsɨ̀ ngónɨá  rɨ̀ ndrě rá rɨ̀ sɨ̀ èfʉ̀ àmvé. Nga  dɨ́ aká ra. Càndɨ́ fʉ èrɨ mà adrípí yɨ tʉ̀. É'dó gèrì ndǎ èrɨ mà àzàkozʉ́.

description: Aabawo lutweela, muumgo mutweela mumwabamo basooleli bataru, nga bawulila naabi basaali baabwe. Ne shiikosi shitweela shonyene ndi baaba baabuumbibwa khukhwaama mu buwuula, shaakila baaba nga bakhola shiindu  shoosi mu shilo mwonyene, lwe khuurya khuuyengukakila mu bukhafu bwe nyaanga. Ne mutweela khu basooleli waakana naabi khuubonakho shiibala nga antsye ali kumuusi, kila akyeenda waarura ibulafu. Aryo waayengukhakila mu bukhafu bwe nyaanga. description: Ngenkathi umama engekho,  ubaba ungiphekela umdokwe. Ingabe uzobamnandi umdokwe kababa?

description: Turibaza igituma hari ibidahuza amabara.

description: Omaama ali kwaba mwirwaliro ku byala era omughala we amughandiikira ebbaluwa.

Inkera E Emanoo
description: Etíi apá olmaréí óata inkéra uní naáning'ishó. Óre enyamáli sápuk naáta náa te emanoó eitobirúno. Néaku kewaríé aké eásisho amú tenéosh enkólong dáma, néshola. Káke étáng'úárrá enkáyíóní nábo peê élô aíj enkolóng te bóo dáma. Néshol enkólong. Néísinánuo iláláshera lényená, káke étónyúáâ áaretu olaláshe lenyê.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: Les Baguettes Du Lion
description: Au début des temps, seul le lion possédait des baguettes qui lui permettaient de détenir le pouvoir du feu. Les autres animaux et les humains décidèrent un jour qu'ils voulaient eux aussi profiter des bienfaits du feu et préparèrent un plan pour voler les baguettes servant à faire le feu.

description: Luister na die verskillende geluide wat diere maak.

title: Simba na Ngiri
description: Ngiri anamnasua Simba kutoka kwenye mtego wa mwindaji. Je,  Simba anafanya nini baada ya hayo?
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Umfowethu olivila
description: Kulendaba,  ubhuti omdala uthukuthele kakhulu ngoba umfowabo omncane ulibele ukudlala ngenkathi yena esebenza kanzima.
author: Clare Verbeek

title: Embaluwa ya'Maama
description: Maama aja mwidwaliro kuzala mughalaghe yamughandiikira e'bbaluwa.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Luister
description: Luister na die verskillende klanka dat deure maak.
author: Bianca Mathews

title: Ng'Ide a Ng'Amonok
description: Kolong ang'orot ayei awi na ayakar ng'ide ng'uni luajokak. Arai ecanit bon ng'esi atamar asubitae kesi a ng'amonok na kaneni asubete ng'iticisio daang nakwaare sodi nyenom kesi akolong nabo tokeyasi. Na kaneni abu edia epei kimu aking'olikin akwapit naparan sodi topudo ng'esi.
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Nitajie majina ya rangi
description: Tunawauliza mama na baba sababu ya vitu kuwa na rangi tofauti.
author: Mutugi Kamundi

title: Os Paus De Fogo Do Leão
description: Antigamente, só o leão sabia fazer fogo ao usar os seus paus de fogo. Os outros animais e as pessoas decidiram que eles queriam também ter as vantagens do fogo e fizeram planos para roubar os paus de fogo ao leão.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Abaana Be Iula
description: Khale yaliwo ifamili nende abaana bataru abeshiribwa. Efitinyu fiali mbu bali balongwa khurula khu iula,  khu fiali mbu bakhole buli shindu eshiro,  khu balasalulukha khumubasu omululu tawe. Ilali yaliwo omusiani wekomba khulola eshialo ngala shiali erwanyi eshiteere. Kho yarula erwanyi okhulola. Kho niyanza okhusalulukha khu mubasu kweliuba lilulu. Abasiani babu bafunikha emioyo,  nibakhaba ngala banyala okhuwonia omusiani wabu.
author: Catherine Were

title: Martin Luther King, Jr. Popularized Peaceful Protest in US
Leeu Se Vuur Stokkies(Vlak 5)
description: In die begin van tyd het mense en diere saam geleef. Die Leeu was die enigste een wat die krag van vuur gehad het. Die ander mense en diere wou ook te krag van vuur gehad het. Hulle het 'n vergadering gehou om die vuur van die leeu te steel, maar dit het nie gewerk nie en dit is hoe die leeu al die diere se vyand geword het.
author: Stephan Coetzee

title: Italanyi Nende Injiri
description: Injiri ihonia Italanyi okhurula khu lukhanda lwo muyiimi. Italanyi ireba okhulia abaana be injiri yakhahonibwa. Injiri irumushira amachesi okhwihonia halala nende oluyia lwaye na Italanyi ilekhwa mulukhanda okhufwira mwo.

title: Taja Rangi

title: Umgqibelo Otjhisa Bhe!
description: Le yindatjana emayelana nabantwana abathathu ebayakuyoduda ngoMgqibelo. Ilanga litjhisa bhe! Manje baduda bekwaba ntambama. Nakukosele bambathe, awa, kubonakala sesikhundla izambatho azikho.

title: Wïnynyu
description: Listen to the many different sounds that animals make.

title: Leão E Facoquero

title: Umjarho Phakathi Kuka Fudu No Nogwatjha
description: Indatjana le imayelana neenlwanyana ezimbili(uFudu noNogwatjha),lapha iinlwanyanezi zombili ziphikisana ngokobana ngisiphi isilwana esinebelo ukudlula esinye.Iinwanezi zaphetha ngokobana ziphalisane ngokugijima emjarhweni.
author: Zanele Sibanyoni

title: Leeu word siek
description: A traditional Cinyungwe animal folktale from Mozambique.

title: Bana Ba Entsoeng Ka Kerese
description: Ho ne ho ena le lapa le ne le ena le bana ba bararo ba hlomphang haholo. Ba ne ba entsoe ka kerese 'me seo se ne se ba thiba ho ka etsa letho letsatsing kapa motséare ka letsoalo la hore ba tla qhibilia. Empa e mong oa bona o ne a batla ho bona hore na kantle ho joang motséare 'me a khetha ho tsoa a ke a bone linonyana le lifate. O qetella a qhibilia letsatsing ho fihlela moo baholoane ba hae ba etsang leqheka la ho mo pholosa.

title: Elumani ... Sawa ‘Disi Wura ‘Diyi
description: We ask why things are different colours.

title: Listen
description: Listen to the many different sounds that animals make.

title: Ho lebeletswe lesea
description: Ena ke pale ya mmetshe e fetotsweng mme e tsamaisa mobadi mmoho le Thabi eo mme wa hae a ileng sepetlele ho fumana ngwana. Mokotaba wa mmetshe o ntsheditswe pele paleng e sebeditsweng botjha,  e tsepameng hodima ho mejara; bolelele ka dimitara le disentimitara le nako ka matsatsi,  dihora le dikgwedi.

title: Umkhonto kaThabani

title: Kulindza  kutalwa kwemntfwana
description: Lena yindzaba lentjintjiwe yetibalo letsatsa lofundzako abe seluhambeni naThabi lomake wakhe aye esibhedlela kuyewutfola umntfwana. Tingcikitsi tetibalo titfutfukisiwe endzabeni lephindze yasetjentwa,  ngekubhekisa ekulinganiseni,  ebudzeni bemamitha nebemasenthimitha kanye netikhatsi emalangeni,  ema-aweni kanye nasetinyangeni.

title: Bana ba entsoeng ka kerese

Ba ne b aka tlhapologa mo letsatsing le le fisang. Mme fela mongwe wa basimane o ne a eletsa go bona tlhabo ya letsatsi mme a tsamaela kwa ntle. Ka madimabe,  o ne a tlhapoloswa ke mogote wa letsatsi. Barwa-rragwe ba utlwile bothoko thata,  mme ba ne ba dira leano la go mo thusa.

Untold Stories of Gogo Matshe: Dooms Decades
description: Lefika is a young basalt rock that formed from the eruption of a volcano on Marion Island. Lefika deposits and crystallizes where he meets his grandmother. Gogo Matshe is very old and has been on Earth for billions of years. Upon meeting Gogo,  Lefika becomes very curious… Not only about the differences in their physical appearance,  but also what caused those differences,  his grandmothers age and her knowledge about the earth. Gogo Matshe tells the story of five great kingdoms,  their rulers (dominant animal or plant life) and how each of these kingdoms came to their demise (became extinct).

Á yú bèy wiyì,  á yèn a wù kì yiì a dzə visəə̀rí. Wìy lòo dzə vitsə́ʼ vímóʼ ví kuúrá nèn a fùnèn rú wun. Bó wìr wóo kfə̌n fəə ji wùn sə wun yòʼ kfə̀n dzə.

title: Looking for Water
description: This book is about a frog looking for cold water.

description: Aina za wanyama mbalimbali wana pia aina ya meno mbalimbali.

description: UKhokho ngumdlwane wami. Yisipho engasiphiwa ngumalume. UKhokho wakhula nomfowabo. Uthe esekhulile uKhokho,  umfowabo waphindiselwa emuva. UKhokho waphatheka kabi ngokwehlukana nomfowabo. Ingabe uzobuye ambone umfowabo futhi?

title: George H.W. Bush's Service Dog Sully Stays by His Side

title: Munyanya Wa Wakwa Coco

description: Nhimbe is a Zimbabwean custom where communities help each other doing work. The story focuses on the community helping Mbuya Sigauke weeding her field.

description: Akatabo kano kagema ku lulenga olwali luli kunoonia amaadhi amainhogovu.

description: Abana babiri barishimye cyane kuko bitegura kujya gusura nyirakuru. Bakunda ubuzima bwo mu cyaro cyane ku buryo iyo bahageze baba batifuza gutaha.

title: Kiveti Kya Muti
description: This is the story of an old man who has everything he wants – except a wife. So he decides to carve one for himself, out of a tree.  Some young men from a neighbouring village decide she is too beautiful for an old man. So they steal her. He is grief-stricken, and tries everything to get her back.
author: Stephen Musyoka

title: Eikere linonia awokusula

author: Esther Kyazike

title: Sí
description: Ànyàpá ndʉ́ ndʉ́ yɨ mà sɨ́ có èselé rá (àzɨ́ 'dɨ̀yi mà sí vɨ́nɨ yo). Àma nɨ́ zòrɨá à'dɨ àfa nɨ 'ɨ́ 'ye àmà sí be nɨ̀ yà?
author: Unknown

title: ENSIGO ENTONO
description: Mu byalo ebiri ku gusozi gwa kenya,  ghaaligho omuguna mulala eyakolanga einho ni maamaghe. Omuguna ono yali mwainamivu inho olw'okubona agabira agabba nga gabuzeegho aye yali mugumu olw'amaani g'ensigo entono.

title: Wakaima, Wampiti ni Wambuzi
description: Wakaima aleta gho endaghukana ghagati ghe ni ebisolo ebindi.

title: Rafiki yangu Koko

author: Ursula Nafula

title: Vakansies by ouma
description: Twee kinders is opgewonde wanneer hulle regmaak vir 'n kuier by Ouma. Hulle geniet die lewe in Ouma se dorpie soveel dat hulle later,  by die huis,  uitsien na hul volgende kuier.

title: Ameeno
description: Hiisi solo yiri n'ameeno gaayo agatafaanana n'agesolo ejindi. Enyuni nijo jibulamo meeno. Hiina ehyola hu meeno geefe hunatiina ni huhula?

title: Wakikere Ne Wamusota

title: Kuseera Amaizi
description: Kanu akatabu kali h'ekikere nekiseera emaizi agakufuuka.

title: Mukagwa ghange Koko

title: Peu ye nnyanennyane

title: Amaino
description: Ebisolo eby'endhawulo biri n'amano gandhawulo.

title: Gera Tipa Ime

title: Olchoré Láí Ojî Coco
description: Coco is my puppy. His brother also comes to live with us, and we are happy together. But the puppies grow too big for me and I can only look after Coco. He is very sad when his brother goes back to his home. What can I do to make Coco happy again?

description: Waaliwo omusajja omukadde ng'alina buli kintu ky'ayagala ng'oggyeeko omukyala. Bw'atyo yeebajjirayo omu okuva mu muti. Abavubuka abaali ku kyalo okumpi ne balaba ng'omukazi oyo mulungi nnyo tasaana musajja mukadde ng'oyo, bwe batyo bamumubbako. Omusajja anakuwala nnyo era agezaako buli ky'asobola okumukomyawo.

description: Ní abúlé kan lórí Òkè Kenya, ọmọ kékeré kan ṣiṣẹ́ nínú oko pẹ̀lú màmá rẹ̀. Ìnú rẹ̀ kò dùn bí i àwọn igbó ńlá ṣe ń kú lọ, ṣùgbọ́n ó mọ́ agbára èso kékeré kan.

title: Inka Ninshuti Yange

title: Ng'ikiel

title: Oku Pati Ru Ri
description: This is the story of an old man who has everything he wants – except a wife. So he decides to carve one for himself, out of a tree.  Some young men from a neighbouring village decide she is too beautiful for an old man. So they steal her. He is grief-stricken, and tries everything to get her back.

title: Omwitsa Wanje Kulukulu

description: 'n Storie oor die belangrikheid van 'n koei vir die mens.

title: Umukhasi We Mu Kusaala
description: Umusaani umusakhuulu abe ali na buli shiindu shoosi sheesi akana – khuurusakho nga s'ali n'umukhasi ta. Kila akhalawo khuubeetsa umukhasi khukhwaama mu kusaala. Ne aabawo basooleli babaandi khukhwaama mu shisiintsa shishililaanilewo babakhaalawo bari ali umumiliwu naabi, s'aakhila umusakhuulu uyo ta, kila beetsa baamwiibawo. Umusakhuulu kumutaambo kwamuwaamba naabi, kila akhalawo khuukhola shoosi sheesi anyalisa khuumukobosa.

title: Losing my mother
description: When my mother died,  i fell apart. She taught me many things except to live without her.

title: Bineensota Galateefatan
description: Seenaa duudhaa gaarii bineensotaa fi jallina ilmaan namaa.

title: Meno
description: Kgang e ka ga mefuta e e farologaneng ya meno a diphologolo le se se diragalang ka meno a rona fa re gola.

description: Walifu w'olunyole: Nn,  Pp,  Rr,  Ss,  Tt,  Vv,  Ww,  Yy,  Zz,  Ŋŋ,  Ny ny.

title: Losing my mother
description: When my mother died,  I fell apart. She taught me many things,  except how to live without her.
author: African Storybook

description: Omusatsa wakofula ali nende buli eshindu shiayenya – halali omukhasi. Kho yanza okhubatsa omukhasi okhurula khwisaka liomusala. Abasiani ababukha okhurula mulukongo lwa ambi awo bapara mbu omukhana nga uno ne eshiombo muno khu mundu omukofu ne bamwiba. Omukofu oyo yafwa omwoyo muno, natema kanyala okhukalusia omukhasi waye.

title: Walifu w'olunyole: N ohwola Z (Ŋ ni Ny)
description: Walifu w'olunyole: Nn,  Pp,  Rr,  Ss,  Tt,  Vv,  Ww,  Yy,  Zz,  Ŋŋ,  Ny ny.

title: Ywomirok  Bothi  Adhadha

title: His Fishy Friends
description: This is the story of Ramu, where he makes new friends in an unexpected way.

title: George H.W. Bush's Service Dog Sully Stays By His Side
Wampologoma
description: Wampologoma nsolo nkambwe buli nsolo yoona yoona egitya.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Dhyaŋ Mere Mawan
description: Kitabo me luwo kwoŋ bero pa dhyaŋ ri wan.

description: Hii ni hadithi kuhusu tabia nzuri za wanyama na tabia mbaya za binadamu.
